resp:

1. Identify the tournaments that belong to the WTA Tier I series by scanning the table. All the tournaments listed are from the WTA Tier I series (Tokyo, Indian Wells, Miami, Charleston, Berlin, Rome, Canada, Moscow, Zurich).
2. Check if each match in these tournaments was played in a different month. To do this, look for repeated months among the 'week' column of the matches from each tournament.
